title: Beef and Guinness® pie
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons olive oil', '600g beef braising steak or shin, cubed', '1 large onion, finely chopped', '1 stick celery, finely chopped', '1 carrot, chopped into small pieces', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon flour', '3/4 can Guinness®', '100ml water', '1 beef stock cube', '3 sprigs thyme, or 1 teaspoon dried thyme', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 sheet pre-rolled puff pastry']
